description: An exciting monthly magazine about boxing.  There are lots of large, colorful photos of pugilistic exploits.

variants.description: An exciting monthly magazine about boxing.  There are lots of large, colorful photos of pugilistic exploits.
A brutal book about using dirty tricks to disrupt your enemies, and using this advantage to knockout or even kill them.
"A Street Warrior's Guide To Tactical Combat Stances", this book provides plenty of information about how stance changes your movement, and how to use each of them with maximum effect.

name.str: First Strike: End a Fight in Ten Seconds or Less!
name.str_pl: copies of First Strike: End a Fight in Ten Seconds or Less!

variants.description: Despite having a pretty odd name, this book provides a lot of information about fighting techniques, and different tactics and skills you need to obtain to use them properly.

name.str_pl: copies of Street Lethal: Unarmed Urban Combat

variants.description: This book contains lot of images showing how to use different attacks in close quarters, but someone has hand-written "lame" on the cover.
"Turn your fist into a weapon of mass destruction!"  This book details different training programs to train your body overall and to temper your hands and nerves into unstoppable forces.

description: It seems to be a wrestling manual, poorly photocopied and released on spiral-bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for unarmed combat.

variants.description: It seems to be a wrestling manual, poorly photocopied and released on spiral-bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for unarmed combat.

name.str_pl: copies of Turn Your Fists Into Sledgehammers!

variants.description: A detailed explanation of how to train your hands, arms and fists to crush the heads of your opponents, with lot of photos and instructions.
A book with a creepy image of death with a scythe on the cover, it guides the user on different attacks that can be combined to overwhelm and destroy your enemy in seconds.

name.str: Knockout: The Ultimate Guide to Sucker Punching
name.str_pl: copies of Knockout: The Ultimate Guide to Sucker Punching

variants.description: This book shows how to use sucker punches - fast and unexpected attacks - to take advantage in a street fight.  Not as useful as before, but it still contains solid information about certain skills and trainings.

name.str: Killer Instinct: Unarmed Combat for Street Survival
name.str_pl: copies of Killer Instinct: Unarmed Combat for Street Survival

variants.description: A shabby book about possible street dangers the author met in his long life, ways to deal with them, and the skill set that such situations require.

name.str: The Bigger They Are, The Harder They Fall
name.str_pl: copies of The Bigger They Are, The Harder They Fall

variants.description: This book explains simple rules that you need to rely on to fight an enemy of different constitution, with techniques and tactics.
